Package se.idsec.signservice.integration.core.error

Interfaces and classes for error handling and representation of errors.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ErrorCode
    When using the SignService Integration Service via a REST API we report errors using error codes (and of course messages).
    ErrorCode.Category
    A typed category (for use in exceptions).
    ErrorCode.Code
    A typed code (for use in exceptions).
    SignServiceIntegrationErrorBody
    The SignServiceIntegrationErrorBodyÂ is a representation of a SignService Integration error message when the service is implemented as a REST service.
    SignServiceIntegrationErrorBody.DssError
    For DSS errors.
    SignServiceIntegrationErrorBody.DssError.DssErrorBuilder  
    SignServiceIntegrationErrorBody.SignServiceIntegrationErrorBodyBuilder  
    SignServiceIntegrationErrorBody.ValidationError
    Representation of validation errors.
    SignServiceIntegrationErrorBody.ValidationError.ValidationErrorBuilder  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    BadRequestException
    Class that represents a bad request to the SignService Integration Service.
    InputValidationException
    Exception class for input validation errors.
    NoAccessException
    Exception class to report that the caller does not have access on a given resource.
    SignServiceIntegrationCategoryException
    Abstract class for exception that reports errors for a given category.
    SignServiceIntegrationException
    Base class for Sign Service Integration exceptions.
